text: Délio dos Santos (4 October 1924 - 1 September 2020) was a Brazilian lawyer and politician. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies between 1979 to 1987. He was born in Rio de Janeiro. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement. Dos Santos died of pneumonia on 1 September 2020 in Rio de Janeiro, aged 95.Morre no Rio o ex-deputado federal Délio dos Santos ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:Politicians from Rio de Janeiro
title: Délio dos Santos
